item.description:
May 30 Sun 8:00 AM
Location
Block Island Ferry (Point Judith)
Galilee State Pier
304 Great Island

Join us for an excursion to the island where we'll have a loosely scheduled day of cycling, the beach, shopping, lunch, etc. The choice is yours!
We'll take the first ferry out at 9:00 am, and return on the last ferry at 5:00 pm. I chose to do this event on Sunday in an effort to avoid travelers who are going to the island for the weekend.
Ferry Tickets
Members are responsible for purchasing their own ferry tickets:
http://www.blockislan....
Remember, it is a holiday weekend, so I advise purchasing sooner than later. Please make sure you purchase a ticket for the traditional (not hi-speed) ferry.
The ferry ride is one-hour. Tickets are $18.95 round-trip. Bicycles are $6.10 round-trip.
Arrival Time:
Try to arrive by 8:00 am so you'll have enough time to park and board the ferry.
Parking
Located down the street from the ferry, and ranges from $5 - $20.
What to bring

· Bike & Lock (if you'd like to ride); or you can rent one on the island for $25(reservation is suggested)
· Water
· Sun Screen
· Breakfast for ferry ride
· Bathing Suit
· Beach Towel
· Snacks
· Cash for Lunch (or we may do a picnic lunch)


This event is weather permitting.
item.name: Block Island
